lead_paragraph: A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday ruled that $1.75 billion in Iranian funds be turned over to families of the victims of the 1983 bombings of a Marine barracks in Beirut.

headline.main: U.S. Court Rules for Beirut Bombing Victims in Iran Funds Case
headline.print_headline: U.S. Court Rules for Beirut Bombing Victims in Iran Funds Case

snippet: A U.S. appeals court on Wednesday ruled that $1.75 billion in Iranian funds be turned over to families of the victims of the 1983 bombings of a Marine barracks in Beirut....
